tool_description: Extract all words from any Youtube video into a string.
name: Youtube Transcriber
title: Youtube Transcriber

api_list.name: Transcribe
api_list.description: Used to extract all text from the audio in a Youtube video.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-transcriber.p.rapidapi.com/transcribe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-transcriber.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-transcriber.p.rapidapi.com/transcribe"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-transcriber.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
